overview: Gadan Mansion is the place where the director has lived so far since she was born. She has suffered family conflicts that have become commonplace such as adultery, private loans and poverty. Such unhappiness, which lasted more than 10 years, gave her suicidal impulses. She begins to see her grandmother who always lives with energy. She is wondering how the grandma could live like that so decides to take a video with her camera.
title: Unprovoked home
